name: Muscletech Cell Tech - 6 lbs
description:
Muscletech Performance Series Cell Tech - 6 lbs

  • CELL-TECH is a creatine formula that delivers a multi-stage combination of carbohydrates that forces a powerful insulin spike post-workout. The powerful carbohydrates trigger insulin output, enabling it to shuttle the massive 5g dose of creatine and other nutrients straight into the muscle. CELL-TECH contains a full 200mg dose of alpha lipoic acid (ALA). Research suggests that ALA helps improve the absorption of creatine and glucose into the muscle cell through specialized transporters. The transporters and increased muscle cell sensitivity allows insulin to rapidly replenish creatine and glycogen stores, facilitating glycogen super-compensation and an intense muscle-expanding effect. CELL-TECH also contains free-form amino acids that aid in this dramatic cell volumization!
  • CELL-TECH can be used by active men, women, fitness enthusiasts, high-performance athletes, powerlifters, crossfitters and bodybuilders. CELL-TECH is particularly effective for hardgainers – lifters who have trouble putting on size.
short_description:

name: MuscleTech Phase 8 Protein - 4.6 lbs
description:
MuscleTech Performance Series Phase 8 Protein - 4.6 lbs

Product description

Flavor: Chocolate

Phase8 is a premium blended fast, medium and sustained-release protein formula that feeds your muscles for 8 hours. Each scoop contains an impressive 26 grams blend of milk-derived proteins that supplies a sustained-release of amino acids. Phase8 has a superior, clean macronutrient profile with only half the carbs and fat of the leading competitor. The main protein component in Phase8 has the unique ability to release amino acids in your blood stream for 8 hours after taking it. 1. Because of these sustained-release properties, it's a highly anabolic and anti-catabolic protein that helps create a muscle-building environment for longer periods of time. Overall, Phase8 contains only high-quality milk-derived protein sources designed to digest at different rates, putting your body in the perfect state for repair and recovery. Unlike other protein blends, you won't find any low quality proteins like rice protein in Phase8. Phase8 was flavored by one of the world's top flavoring houses by protein flavoring experts in order to taste better than any other protein on the market. Phase8 contains high quality milk-derived protein and has half the fat and carbs of the leading competitor. No proprietary blends/no under dosed key ingredients, no fillers-period. MuscleTech performance series supplements gives it to you straight with fully disclosed doses (no proprietary blends), no fillers, no hype and no exceptions. Our products are built on legitimate science so that you get what you pay for. Make the smart choice. We challenge you to compare.

name: MuscleTech NitroTech Power 100% Whey Protein Blend, Chocolate (4lbs)
description:
MuscleTech NitroTech Power 100% Whey Protein Blend, 4lbs

  • No Proprietary Blends
  • No Fillers
  • No Underdosed Key Ingredients
  • No Hype
  • No Banned Substances
  • No Exceptions

Superior Science. Superior Results.

The Ultimate Muscle-Amplifying Protein

Nitro-Tech Power is the latest musclebuilding innovation from MuscleTech, the brand with over 20 years of excellence. Nitro-Tech Power contains several key ingredients shown in multiple clinical studies to help you pack on more muscle than ever. See the research for yourself!

Scientifically Superior Musclebuilding Protein

¹To create the ultimate musclebuilding protein, MuscleTech researchers started by packing a researched dose of 6 g of creatine into every 2 scoops of Nitro-Tech Power.

In a double-blind, placebo controlled study, subjects supplementing with this same dose of creatine gained 11 lbs. of mass in 12 weeks (versus 7.5 lbs. for the placebo group).

Nitro-Tech Power also contains a scientifically validated 2.5 g dose of betaine (per 2 scoops), which has been shown in multiple studies to increase strength and lean muscle. In a gold-standard study, subjects gained 3.75 lbs. of muscle in 6 weeks (vs. 0.66 lbs. for the placebo) - an incredible 5 times the muscle!

Increased Muscle Strength and Amplified Recovery

²This super-engineered formula is loaded with 14.8 g of BCAAs, including 8 g of highly anabolic leucine (in 2 scoops), and is sure to ignite protein synthesis and put your body in a prime anabolic state. The amount of leucine found in just one scoop of Nitro-Tech Power has been scientifically shown to increase strength by over 40%!

³What's more, this complete formula also features the 480 mg dose (per 2 scoops) of tart cherry powder that has been shown in emerging research to improve recovery through the reduction of muscle soreness post-exercise.

Enhanced ATP Regeneration and Free Testosterone Support

4Nitro-Tech Power delivers a potent dose of creatine, which research has shown can help your body regenerate ATP energy stores depleted during resistance training.

5MuscleTech researchers also included the scientifically studied 200 mg dose of boron citrate (per 2 scoops) supplying a dose of boron that has been shown to decrease estradiol and increase free testosterone within the normal range in only 7 days.

name: Muscletech Premium 100% Whey Protein Plus, 5lbs
description:
Muscletech Premium 100% Whey Protein Plus, 5lbs

Ultra-Premium Protein Featuring Whey Peptides & Protein Isolate

Unlike other inferior whey protein formulas that may use heat, harsh acids and salt, a superior cold microfiltration process is used to product the ultra-pure whey protein found in every scoop of Premium Gold 100% Whey Protein. The whey protein in Premium Gold 100% Whey Protein is so pure that the formula mixes instantly in a shaker cup or even in a glass using a spoon. And just as important as the quality and purity of the whey protein in Premium Gold 100% Whey Protein is its taste. We conducted multiple taste tests to help us formulate a first-in-class taste profile that's second to none.

Whey Peptides

Also known as hydrolyzed whey protein, whey peptides are fast-absorbing whey protein micro-fractions. They have the powerful ability to promote rapid recovery from exercise and improve nutrient delivery by increasing insulin.

Whey Isolate

Our whey protein isolate is micro-filtered to remove more lactose, carbs and fat. This premium whey protein isolate provides your body with the highest biological value (BV) protein fractions. BV is a measure of how much of the protein's compounds your body holds on to - a higher BV indicates a protein source with more musclebuilding potential.

MUSCLETECH®: SUPERIOR SCIENCE. SUPERIOR RESULTS.™

Our mission is to develop the most scientifically advanced and effective supplements to help you build muscle and strength and improve athletic performance. Backed by fully disclosed formulas, human clinical studies on fully dosed key ingredients, no banned substances and over 20 year of success, MuscleTech® delivers superior science for superior results!

¹In a groundbreaking clinical study, the key ingredient in Premium Gold 100% Whey Protein helped test subjects build 5.1 lbs. of pure muscle!
♦MuscleTech® is America's #1 Selling Bodybuilding Supplement Brand based on cumulative wholesale dollar sales 2001 to present.

Suggested Use

Mix 1 scoop with 6 oz. of cold water or skim milk in a glass or shaker cup. Use between major meals and before and after exercise. Read the entire label before use and follow directions provided.

name: MuscleTech Essential Series Platinum Fish Oil - 100 Capsules
description:
MuscleTech Platinum Fish Oil - 100 Capsules

MT - Superior Science. Superior Results.

MuscleTech Essential Series delivers all your favorite ingredients and products with the best science, taste and value. Essential Series products are staples for every athlete, with no frills and no fillers - just products you can trust backed by the best brand in sports nutrition!

Many supplement companies don't fully disclose their ingredients. They also don't invest in science, research or quality control. At MuscleTech, a portion of every dollar spent on supplements is allocated towards funding scientific research. This means you can trust Essential Series for superior quality and results, as is the MuscleTech promise.

Ultra-Pure Omega-3s

Platinum 100% Omega Fish Oil uses only the most ultra-pure filtered fish oil to supply the key omega-3 fatty acids in fish oil docosahexaenoic acid (DHA) and eicosapentaenoic acid (EPA Platinum 100% Omega Fish Oil soft gels give your body the EPA and DHA it needs to be its very best.

No Fishy Aftertaste

An enteric coating on the delicate soft gels prevents premature breakdown and helps you avoid the fishy aftertaste or bothersome fish burps you may get with lower quality fish oil products!

‡ MuscleTech is America's #1 Selling Bodybuilding Supplement Brand based on cumulative wholesale dollar sales 2001 to present.

name: Muscletech Neurocore Pro Series - (Icy Blue Raspberry)
description:
Muscletech Neurocore Pro Series - (Icy Blue Raspberry)

Ultra-Potent, Super-Concentrated Pre-Workout Stimulant

NeuroCore® is the most explosive super-concentrated pre-workout stimulant available. Unlike the other guys, NeuroCore® features potent key ingredients in clinically studied amounts for maximum strength to deliver extreme energy, intense focus and superior workouts.

Beta-Alanine

A 3.2 g clinical dose of beta-alanine in 2 scoops to enhance the muscle- and strength-building process.

L-Citrulline 

Research-tested dose of pure L-citrulline for intense, long-lasting muscle pumps.

Creatine Hydrochloride (HCL)

Creatine HCI is a highly potent form of creatine. Creatine is clinically validated tom amplify gains in size and strength. This precise 3 g dose per 2 scoops won't cause bloating and requires no loading phase!

Rhodiola Extract

The 100 mg dose of the adaptogen, rhodiola extract, in 2 scoops of NeuroCore®, has been shown to improve mental and physical fitness during times of stress.

NeuroCore® L-Citrulline  Creatine Beta-Alanine Rhodiola
Per 2 Scoops 3 g 3 g Creatine HCl 3.2 g 100 mg
Leading Competitor 0 Undisclosed Amounts No Adaptogens
Benefits Superior Pumps Enhanced Muscle & Strength Adaptogenic Herb

Suggested Use

Shake container thoroughly before use. Consume 30 to 45 minutes before activity. We strongly recommend that you assess your tolerance first by using 1 scoop mixed with 6 oz. of water, especially if you are sensitive to stimulants. For full effects, mix 2 scoops with 12 oz. of water once your tolerance has been assessed. Do not exceed 2 scoops in a 24-hour period. Maintain an adequate state of hydration during use. Read the entire label before use and follow directions provided.

Pre - Use 30-45 Min. Pre-Workout

Other Ingredients

Silicon dioxide, natural and artificial flavors, citric acid, malic acid, acesulfame-potassium, sucralose, fd&c red no.40.Processed in a facility that processes milk, egg, wheat, soy, peanut, tree nuts, fish and shellfish ingredients.

name: MuscleTech Mass Tech Extreme(2000) 22 lbs
description:
MuscleTech Mass Tech Extreme(2000) 22 lbs

 

MuscleTech is a sports nutrition company, marketed by Iovate Health Sciences Inc. It was later acquired by Chinese company Xiwang Group Company Ltd. MuscleTech Mass-Tech Extreme 2000 Lean Mass Gainer is in good demand among the customers. It has presence in multiple countries. MuscleTech Mass-Tech Extreme 2000 Lean Mass Gainer is a mix of 100% Whey Protein and Mass Gainer that is Designed To Build Size And Strength.

Primary Nutrition Summary

6 heaping scoops (570 g) contains Calories 2,050, Calories From Fat 55, Total Fat 6 g, Saturated Fat 3 g, Cholesterol 190 mg, Total Carbohydrate 440 g, Dietary Fiber 3 g, Sugars 20 g, Protein 60 g.

Flavours & Taste

Triple Chocolate Eruption is the best selling flavour for MuscleTech Mass-Tech Extreme 2000 Lean Mass Gainer.

Direction For Use

Mix 3 heaping scoops with 300 ml of water or skim milk and consume twice daily. You can consume in the morning, between meals or post-workout.

description:
MuscleTech Platinum 100% Creatine, 400 gm

It provides your muscles with the most clinically researched form of micronized creatine available Creatine is able to rapidly enhance your muscle cells' ability to regenerate adenosine triphosphate ATP.

Benefits;

  • Provides your muscles with the most clinically researched form of micronized creatine
  • Delivers creatine directly to your muscles
  • Creatine acts as a phosphate donor pool to hard-working muscles, allowing you to train harder, for longer.
  • Can be used by everyone, from active men and women to high-performance athletes, powerlifters, cross-fitters, bodybuilders, endurance athletes, etc
  • Builds more muscle size and strength
  • Increases cell volumization
  • Boosts strength
